verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:6
verses.text: He made also ten lavers, and put five on the right hand, and five on the left, to wash in them: such things as they offered for the burnt offering they washed in them; but the sea was for the priests to wash in.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:7
verses.text: And he made ten candlesticks of gold according to their form, and set them in the temple, five on the right hand, and five on the left.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:8
verses.text: He made also ten tables, and placed them in the temple, five on the right side, and five on the left. And he made an hundred basons of gold.
